reward.uniqueCollateral: Unique collateral methods, community-led, and VELAS-powered forunmatched efficiency and security.
reward.topNotchSecurity: Top-notch security with audits, transparent operations, and robust risk controls.

getStarted.startTrading: Start trading synthetic assets today and seize limitless possibilities in the financial markets.

footer.symbloxLinks: Symblox links traditional finance and DeFi with transparency and community power. Simple, decentralized, and forward-thinking.

privacy.byClickingIAgree: By clicking “I Agree” below, you agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement. As such, you fully understand that:
privacy.symbloxIsABlockchain: Symblox is a blockchain-based decentralized finance project. You are participating at your own risk.
privacy.symbloxIsOffered: Symblox is offered for use “as is” and without any guarantees regarding security. The protocol is made up of immutable code and can be accessed through a variety of user interfaces.
privacy.noCentralEntity: No central entity operates the Symblox protocol. Decisions related to the protocol are governed by a dispersed group of participants who collectively govern and maintain the protocol.
privacy.symbloxDAO: Symblox DAO does not unilaterally offer, maintain, operate, administer, or control any trading interfaces. The only user interfaces maintained by Symblox DAO are the governance and staking interfaces herein.
privacy.youCanParticipate: You can participate in the governance process by staking SBX tokens in accordance with the rules and parameters summarized here, and/or joining the Symblox Discord and contributing to the conversation.
privacy.theRules: The rules and parameters associated with the Symblox protocol and Symblox DAO governance are subject to change at any time.
privacy.yourUseOfSymblox: Your use of Symblox is conditioned upon your acceptance to be bound by the Symblox Term of Use, which can be found here.
privacy.theLawsThatApply: The laws that apply to your use of Symblox may vary based upon the jurisdiction in which you are located. We strongly encourage you to speak with legal counsel in your jurisdiction if you have any questions regarding your use of Symblox.
privacy.byEntering: By entering into this agreement, you are not agreeing to enter into a partnership. You understand that Symblox is a decentralized protocol provided on an “as is” basis.
privacy.youHereby: You hereby release all present and future claims against Symblox DAO related to your use of the protocol, the SBX token, SBX DAO governance, and any other facet of the protocol.
privacy.youAgree: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless SBX DAO and its affiliates for any costs arising out of or relating to your use of the Symblox protocol.
privacy.youAreNot: You are not accessing the protocol from Burma (Myanmar), Cuba, Iran, Sudan, Syria, the Western Balkans, Belarus, Côte d’Ivoire, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, North Korea, Russia, certain sanctioned areas of Ukraine, Somalia, Venezuela, Yemen, or Zimbabwe (collectively, “Prohibited Jurisdictions”), or any other jurisdiction listed as a Specially Designated National by the United States Office of Foreign Asset Control (“OFAC”).

stakingBoard.migrateContent: Migrate SYX into SBX to get SBX more for staking.
stakingBoard.borrowSUSD: Borrow sUSD by staking your SBX.
stakingBoard.useTheBurn: Use the burn feature to maintain your c-ratio or completely pay off debt and unstake your SBX.
stakingBoard.maintainYourTarget: Maintain your target C-Ratio to collect your weekly rewards.
stakingBoard.connectWalletFirst: Connect wallet first to reveal the APR

stakingBurn.title: Burn Debt
stakingBurn.description: Burn your sUSD debt to unlock your staked SNX. This will increase your Collateralization Ratio and reduce your debt. Learn more.
stakingBurn.burnTooltip: Burn Your sUSD or Staked SBX
stakingBurn.burnInputExplanation: Burn sUSD to increase your C-ratio
stakingBurn.stakeInputExplanation: When your c-ratio is below target, all your SBX is staked

stakingMint.mintSUSD: Mint sUSD by staking your SBX. SBX stakers earn weekly staking rewards in exchange for managing their Collateralization Ratio and debt.
stakingMint.yourStakedSBX: Your staked SBX will be locked for 7 days.
stakingMint.howMuchSBX: How much SBX do you want to stake?
stakingMint.howMuchSBXYouStake: How much SBX you stake will determine how much sUSD you can borrow

stakingReward.earnSBX: Earn Rewards Staking SNX tokens offers weekly rewards in both inflationary SNX and sUSD from trading fees.

escrow.vestYourSBX: Vest your SBX staking rewards in escrow
escrow.vestSBXExlain: If you have staked your SBX and minted sUSD, you are eligible to receive SBX staking rewards, which will be escrowed here which you can vest in 12 months from the claim date.

migration.migrateContent: Migrate Your SYX token into SBX token. You will get 20% of new SBX tokens right away. The remaining 80% of SBX tokens will be locked for 6 months.
migration.migrateGuide: You'll be able to access 13.33% of the locked tokens each month after 6 month lock-up period.
migration.claimableAmountTooltip: Amount You can get at Next Claim
migration.migrationHeader: How much SYX do you want to swap?
migration.migrationHeaderTooltip: How much SBX you stake will determine how much sUSD you can borrow
migration.sbxAmountGet: Amount of SBX You can get
migration.sbxAmountTooltip: How much SBX will you get from migration

governance.symbloxIsA: Symblox is a decentralized protocol run by governance, with representative councils elected by the community, ensuring every decision reflects the collective voice of its users.
governance.theSymbloxProtocol: The Symblox protocol is governed by a decentralized set of
governance.votingPower.desc: By staking SBX tokens, users gain the authority to vote within the Symblox protocol, directly influencing its future direction. This voting power is crucial in electing representative councils that align with their vision for Symblox's evolution.
governance.nominationProcess.desc: The nomination is open to all; anyone interested can self-nominate for a position on one of the four councils. Candidates must use the governance app during the specified election period, providing details about their qualifications and experience.
governance.electionCycle.desc: Elections occur every epoch, a period spanning four months. During this phase, SBX stakers cast their votes, selecting the individuals they believe are best suited to guide each council.
governance.ongoingCycle.desc: The Symblox governance cycle is continuous, with each epoch marking the beginning of a new phase. This cycle includes the nomination of candidates, the electoral process, and the ongoing execution of roles, ensuring the constant evolution and management of the Symblox Protocol.
governance.initiativesBy.desc: Apart from the governing councils, non-governing DAOs like the Treasury Council, Ambassadors, and Grants Committee undertake various initiatives within each epoch. These initiatives include allocating new grants, fostering partnerships, and managing the treasury's assets.
governance.decisionMaking.desc: Once elected, Spartan Councillors have the responsibility to deliberate on Symblox Improvement Proposals (SIPs) and Symblox Configuration Change Proposals (SCCPs). These decisions are made after considering presentations and feedback from the community, gathered through the Symblox Discord.

perpetual.header.desc: Symblox Perps offers integrators deep liquidity, low fees and additional resources for building your own frontend.
perpetual.symbloxPerps.descMid: are a set of permissionless and decentralized smart contracts, offering
perpetual.symbloxPerps.deepLiquidity: deep liquidity and low trading fees
perpetual.symbloxPerps.end: on a range of synthetic assets.
perpetual.deepLiquidity.desc: All supported markets benefit from deep liquidity and low fees, thanks to the use of fully decentralized off-chain oracles and Symblox liquidity.
perpetual.wideVariety.desc: Symblox Perps supports a wide array of synthetic assets, which is determined and updated by the decentralized governance process.
perpetual.revenueShare.desc: Integrators are rewarded for driving volume through Symblox Perps.
perpetual.capitalEfficient.desc: The protocol supports leverage up to 50x on supported markets, making Symblox Perps highly capital-efficient.
perpetual.supportedLaunch.desc: There is a thriving ecosystem of integrators and related Symblox protocols, to provide feedback, early testing and support.
perpetual.integrateSymblox: Integrate Symblox Perps with your platform
perpetual.integrateSymblox.desc: Learn more about how to integrate Perps and other Symblox markets in our developer documentation and reach out to the developer over
